mainHero.title: Phinding Nemo
mainHero.description: Discovered a new phishing email? Submit the email below for the it to be incorporated in our phishing detector software for future use.

items.title: Utilize an extension that incorporates advanced algorithms to identify and warn you about potential phishing attempts, ensuring your personal information

items.name: Real-Time Protection
items.description: Receive immediate alerts for suspicious emails through the extension which analyzes sender information and email content to detect for red flags.

items.name: User-Friendly Interface
items.description: Seamless integration of the extension into the browser, allowing for an intuitive interface that's easy to use.

items.name: Regular Updates
items.description: Stay safe with regular updates to the algorithm that enhance detection capabilities, allowing for the detector to continuously evolve with increasing online threats.

items.name: User-Input Inclusive Algorithm
items.description: Allows for users to report suspected phishing emails to refine the algorithm to allow for the detector to continuously evolve with increasing online threats.

sections.name: Download Extension
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
